description: Get an assessed machine with its size & cost estimate that was evaluated in the specified assessment.

subscription_id.description: Azure Subscription Id in which project was created.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that project is part of.

assessment_name.description: Unique name of an assessment within a project.

assessed_machine_name.description: Unique name of an assessed machine evaluated as part of an assessment.

project_name.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

group_name.description: Unique name of a group within a project.

accept_language.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.

api_version.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.
